channel.title: Data-Sciences on Raghu Vijaykumar
channel.description: Recent content in Data-Sciences on Raghu Vijaykumar

item.title: Using Ollama for Note Generation Locally
item.description: we will explore how to use the ollama library to run and connect to models locally for generating readable and easy-to-understand notes. We will walk through the process of setting up the environment, running the code, and comparing the performance and quality of different models like llama3:8b, phi3:14b, llava:34b, and llama3:70b. I generated notes from a transcript of a YouTube video in markdown format, with no changes in prompt, here I have included pdf versions.
